content:
The Ruffwear Roamer Leash is a fantastic choice for a hands-free leash.

Aww, that's so cool about the new dog tag for Max! A bone-shaped tag with his name and your phone number engraved on it is not only adorable but also a great way to ensure Max's safety. It's always a good idea to have some form of identification on your dog's collar, just in case he ever gets lost.

If you don't mind me asking, what's Max's personality like? Is he a high-energy pup who loves to run and play, or is he more of a laid-back, cuddly companion?

Also, have you considered getting Max microchipped as an additional safety measure? Microchipping can increase the chances of being reunited with your furry friend if he ever gets lost. Just a thought!
